@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.name: PlayCoin

attributes.documentation: @dev modifier to limit access to the owner only
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev limit access to the vault only
attributes.name: onlyVault

attributes.documentation: @dev limit access to the admin only
attributes.name: onlyAdmin

attributes.documentation: @dev limit access to admin or vault
attributes.name: onlyAdminOrVault

attributes.documentation: @dev limit access to owner or vault
attributes.name: onlyOwnerOrVault

attributes.name: onlyAdminOrOwner

@dev transfer token from sender to other
        the result balance should be greater than or equal to the reserved token amount
attributes.name: transfer

@param _newOwner new owner address
attributes.name: setOwner

@dev change admin address

attributes.name: setAdmin
recall

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfer tokens from one address to another
     * The _from's PLY balance should be larger than the reserved amount(reserves[_from]) plus _value.
attributes.name: transferFrom

attributes.documentation: @dev get the amount of reserved token
attributes.name: reserveOf

attributes.documentation: @dev get the amount reserved token of the sender
